content: **knitted hat with nordic pattern in drops karisma theme christmas** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern u-912 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** s/m - l/xl head circumference approx 54/56 - 58/60 cm height 24-25 cm **materials** drops karisma from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100 g colour 82 maroon base colour 50-50 g colour 77 light oak pattern colour or use 100-100 g colour 04 chocolate brown base colour 50-50 g colour 77 light oak pattern colour or use 100-100 g colour 11 orange base colour 50-50 g colour 77 light oak pattern colour or use 100-100 g colour 69 light grey green base colour 50-50 g colour 01 off white pattern colour **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row vertically in stocking stitch and nordic pattern = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 for stocking stitch drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm for rib needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to a larger needle size if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to a smaller needle size
